title: Bharat Bandh Live Updates: After HC intervention, Kerala govt issues order against general strike - The Indian Express
content:
1. Bharat Bandh Live Updates: After HC intervention, Kerala govt issues order against general strike  The Indian Express
  2. 2-Day Bharat Bandh Called By Trade, Bank Unions Begins  NDTV
  3. General strike: Opposition moves motion to discuss workers’ issues  BusinessLine
  4. Maharashtra: Two-day strike unlikely to affect services, say power companies  The Indian Express
  5. Trade Unions Call For Bharat Bandh Today, Tomorrow: Your 10-Point Guide  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Bharat Bandh Today Live Updates, Bharat Bandh Live, March 28: The nationwide strike comes following a meeting on March 22 where the trade unions said that they would protest against the Centre’s “anti-worker, anti-farmer, anti-people and anti-national policies”.
